languages.text: "Ксенос в свите Вольного Торговца — явление допустимое. Хотя весьма нежелательное и чреватое опасностями".
"Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос в свите Вольного Торговца — явление допустимое. Хотя весьма нежелательное и чреватое опасностями".

traits.locale_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."
"Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."
"Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

languages.text: “异形与行商浪人同行，这种事情有可以接受的先例。不过，这种行为非常不可取，而且充满了危险。”
languages.original_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

traits.locale_text: “异形与行商浪人同行，这种事情有可以接受的先例。不过，这种行为非常不可取，而且充满了危险。”

languages.text: «La presencia de xenos en la comitiva de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente es un precedente aceptable, aunque muy poco recomendable y cargado de riesgos».
languages.original_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

traits.locale_text: «La presencia de xenos en la comitiva de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente es un precedente aceptable, aunque muy poco recomendable y cargado de riesgos».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の従者となった異種族であれば、許容可能な前例です。極めて不快かつ危険極まりないことですが」
languages.original_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の従者となった異種族であれば、許容可能な前例です。極めて不快かつ危険極まりないことですが」

languages.text: "Ein Xenos im Gefolge {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist ein annehmbarer Präzedenzfall. Wenn auch hochgradig unerwünscht und gefährlich."
languages.original_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Xenos im Gefolge {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist ein annehmbarer Präzedenzfall. Wenn auch hochgradig unerwünscht und gefährlich."

languages.text: « La présence de xénos dans l'entourage d'un libre-marchand est un précédent acceptable, quoique très indésirable et on ne peut plus dangereux. »
languages.original_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

traits.locale_text: « La présence de xénos dans l'entourage d'un libre-marchand est un précédent acceptable, quoique très indésirable et on ne peut plus dangereux. »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde bir zenonun bulunması, daha önce pek örneği olmasa da kabul edilebilir bir durumdur. Elbette bu, hoş karşılanacağı anlamına gelmez. Arz ettiği tehlike de endişe verici."
languages.original_text: "Xenos in the retinue of a Rogue Trader is an acceptable precedent. Although highly undesirable and fraught with danger."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde bir zenonun bulunması, daha önce pek örneği olmasa da kabul edilebilir bir durumdur. Elbette bu, hoş karşılanacağı anlamına gelmez. Arz ettiği tehlike de endişe verici."
